name: @transit/async-cache
description: Cache your async lookups and don't fetch the same thing more than necessary.

scripts.lint: npm run format && npm run eslint
scripts.release: npm run test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Isaac Z. Schlueter <i@izs.me> (http://blog.izs.me/)
